reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Carter's lectures are engaging and clear. She has a deep understanding of the subject and makes difficult concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Smith is very knowledgeable, but sometimes his explanations are a bit too fast. Overall, a good professor.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are informative, but she can be hard to follow at times. The material is challenging, but she is approachable during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is amazing! His programming assignments are practical and really prepare you for the industry.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's classes are very content-heavy, and her exams are difficult. She could do a better job of breaking down complex topics.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. White is very passionate about history. His lectures are interesting, but sometimes he goes off on tangents.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is one of the best professors I've had. She explains economic theories clearly and relates them to real-world scenarios.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit dry. Participation in discussions is encouraged.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is very engaging and encourages students to think critically about political issues. Her exams are fair, but challenging.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is an excellent lecturer. He makes the subject matter interesting and easy to grasp. Highly recommend his classes.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Hall's lectures are thorough, but sometimes a bit monotonous. The course requires a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is very passionate about literature and it shows in his teaching. His classes are enjoyable, but the reading load is heavy.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Hernandez is fantastic. She is very knowledgeable and her enthusiasm for the subject is contagious. Her classes are a must-take.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Allen's classes are well-structured and informative. He provides practical examples that help in understanding complex business concepts.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Walker's lectures are informative, but the pace can be overwhelming. She is very approachable for questions after class.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. King is an excellent professor. His lectures are clear, and his projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Scott has a wealth of knowledge in art history. Her classes are interesting, but the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Young's lectures can be difficult to follow, and the material is challenging. However, he is willing to help students outside of class.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Green is a great professor. She explains complex linguistic theories in an understandable way, and her assignments are fair.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Baker is one of the best physics professors I've had. His explanations are clear, and he makes difficult topics easy to understand.
